languages.text: "Да уж, Абеляр. Если бы в твою смену прикончили второго Вольного Торговца подряд, кто-то мог бы и усомниться в твоей компетенции, а?"
"Indeed, Abelard, one Rogue Trader dying on your watch is bad enough, but two in a row? People might start questioning your competence, eh?"
languages.original_text: "Да уж, Абеляр. Если бы в твою смену прикончили второго Вольного Торговца подряд, кто-то мог бы и усомниться в твоей компетенции, а?"

traits.locale_text: "Indeed, Abelard, one Rogue Trader dying on your watch is bad enough, but two in a row? People might start questioning your competence, eh?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Indeed, Abelard, one Rogue Trader dying on your watch is bad enough, but two in a row? People might start questioning your competence, eh?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Indeed, Abelard, one Rogue Trader dying on your watch is bad enough, but two in a row? People might start questioning your competence, eh?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Indeed, Abelard, one Rogue Trader dying on your watch is bad enough, but two in a row? People might start questioning your competence, eh?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “确实该这样，阿贝拉德。一个行商浪人死在你眼皮底下已经够糟糕了，要是连续死了两个呢？人们说不定会开始怀疑你的能力，是吧？”
languages.original_text: "Indeed, Abelard, one Rogue Trader dying on your watch is bad enough, but two in a row? People might start questioning your competence, eh?"

traits.locale_text: “确实该这样，阿贝拉德。一个行商浪人死在你眼皮底下已经够糟糕了，要是连续死了两个？人们说不定会开始怀疑你的能力，是吧？”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « En effet, Abélard. Après tout, si non pas {mf|un|une} mais deux {mf|libres-marchands|libres-marchandes} mouraient sous votre surveillance, les gens commenceraient sans doute à remettre vos compétences en question. »
languages.original_text: "Indeed, Abelard, one Rogue Trader dying on your watch is bad enough, but two in a row? People might start questioning your competence, eh?"

traits.locale_text: « En effet, Abélard. Après tout, si non pas {mf|un|une} mais deux {mf|libres-marchands|libres-marchandes} mouraient sous votre surveillance, les gens commenceraient sans doute à remettre vos compétences en question. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Así es, Abelard. Perder una Comerciante Independiente ya era bastante malo, pero ¿dos seguid{mf|o|a}s? La gente empezaría a poner en duda su competencia, ¿no cree?».
languages.original_text: "Indeed, Abelard, one Rogue Trader dying on your watch is bad enough, but two in a row? People might start questioning your competence, eh?"

traits.locale_text: «Así es, Abelard. Perder una Comerciante Independiente ya era bastante malo, pero ¿dos seguid{mf|o|a}s? La gente empezaría a poner en duda su competencia, ¿no cree?».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「ホントだよ、アベラルド。ひとりの自由開拓者がアンタの目の前で死にかけるだけでも十分な凶事なのに、ふたりも続いたとあったらね。人民はアンタの能力を疑い始めてたかもよ？」
languages.original_text: "Indeed, Abelard, one Rogue Trader dying on your watch is bad enough, but two in a row? People might start questioning your competence, eh?"

traits.locale_text: 「ホントだよ、アベラルド。ひとりの自由開拓者がアンタの目の前で死にかけるだけでも十分な凶事なのに、ふたりも続いたとあったらね。人民はアンタの能力を疑い始めてたかもよ？」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "In der Tat, Abelard. Es reicht schon, wenn ein Freihändler unter Eurer Aufsicht stirbt, aber zwei in Folge? Da könnte man ja anfangen, Eure Kompetenz in Frage zu stellen, was?"
languages.original_text: "Indeed, Abelard, one Rogue Trader dying on your watch is bad enough, but two in a row? People might start questioning your competence, eh?"

traits.locale_text: "In der Tat, Abelard. Es reicht schon, wenn ein Freihändler unter Eurer Aufsicht stirbt, aber zwei in Folge? Da könnte man ja anfangen, Eure Kompetenz in Frage zu stellen, was?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: "Indeed, Abelard, one Rogue Trader dying on your watch is bad enough, but two in a row? People might start questioning your competence, eh?"

languages.text: "Haklısın Abelard. Sen görev başındayken bir Hür Tacir'in ölmesi zaten yeterince kötü. Bir de kayıplar iki olsa... İnsanlar senin yeterliliğini sorgulamaya başlayabilir gibi ha, ne dersin?"
languages.original_text: "Indeed, Abelard, one Rogue Trader dying on your watch is bad enough, but two in a row? People might start questioning your competence, eh?"

traits.locale_text: "Haklısın Abelard. Sen görev başındayken bir Hür Tacir'in ölmesi zaten yeterince kötüydü ama iki zayiat mı? İnsanlar senin yeterliliğini sorgulamaya başlayabilir gibi ha, ne dersin?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
